hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Stray Fairy#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Stray Fairy#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Kokiri Emerald#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a #generic grotto#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #the Tower#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Queen Gohma#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Epona's Song#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Ocarina C up Button# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Boomerang#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #fairy outside Ganon's Castle# holds #a Red Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple MQ Upper Water Switch Hookshot Wonderitem

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #stalfos in the Shadow Temple# guard #the Spirit Temple Boss Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Stalfos Room Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: Did you know that Gorons understood SRM long before speedrunners did?

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Requiem of Spirit#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Epona's Song#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #before the Truth Spinner gap# in the Shadow Temple locked chests contain...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Deku Stick Capacity#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Hover Boots Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a #generic grotto#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the Development branch may be unstable.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #2# major items.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Boomerang#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Requiem of Spirit#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Kokiri Emerald#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #the Fire Medallion# and #the Water Temple Boss Key#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Fairy Bottle#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Entrance Front Left Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to the #Goron Ruby#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #7# major items.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #generic grotto#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Stray Fairy# can be found in #the Market#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Stray Fairy# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that Jabu Jabu is no longer a pescetarian in Master Quest.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.
